Key Match Events: Luis Severino pitched a dominant seven-inning start, sealing a 4-1 Mets victory
Pre-Game Insights: The Red Sox had conversations with Luis Severino after he became a free agent last offseason, but ultimately did not sign him
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora expressed concern that the Red Sox are 'running out of time'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox have scored exactly one run in three consecutive games
